#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdint.h>
int smod10(unsigned long n)
{
    int sum = 0,digit;
    while(n)
    {
        digit = n%10;
        sum += digit;
        if(digit%2==0)
            sum += digit;
        n/=10;
    }
    return sum%10;
}
int main(int argc, char **argv)
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    unsigned long a,b,d;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lu %lu",&a,&b);
        d = 0;
        while((a<b)&&(a%10!=0))
        {
            d+= smod10(a);
            a++;
        }
        while((b>a)&&(b%10!=0))
        {
            d+= smod10(b);
            b--;
        }
        
        d += ((b-a)/10)*45;
        d += smod10(b);
        printf("%lu\n",d);
    }
}
